sceneDescription.title: First Steps Into the Station Interior

setting.location: Main corridor of orbital research station above planet Solaris

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair, steady gait, observant eyes scanning surroundings
characters.clothing: Clean futuristic uniform, carrying small travel case
characters.position: Walking down central corridor with measured steps
characters.action: Moving forward with scientific curiosity, head turning to examine station architecture and equipment

scene.mainElements: Long metallic corridor with curved walls, multiple doorways, advanced technological equipment mounted on walls, soft ambient lighting from ceiling strips
scene.details: Polished metal surfaces reflecting footsteps, control panels with steady indicator lights, ventilation grilles humming quietly, geometric architectural patterns, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Corridor extending into distance with perspective lines, occasional glimpses of equipment rooms through open doorways, subtle shadows from overhead lighting
scene.atmosphere: Calm exploration, technological sophistication, quiet anticipation, sense of entering a world of advanced science

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot following character from behind
composition.focus: Character's steady progression through station environment
composition.depth: Character in middle ground, corridor walls framing foreground, distant corridor sections creating depth
